title: [Bug]: Incorrect Y limits
Description: The intended visualization is a figure with 4 subplots, each having a y-limit set to (-300, 300). All subplots should display a y-axis label indicating "axis 0" through "axis 3" respectively. However, the current plot incorrectly shows the y-limits as (-200, 200) instead of the specified (-300, 300). Similar issues arise when different y-limits are set, resulting in the limits not reflecting the intended values.
